title: "Unlocking language barriers: Translate application logs with Amazon Translate for seamless support"
excerpt: "This post addresses the challenge faced by developers and support teams when application logs are presented in languages other than English, making it difficult for them to debug and provide support. The proposed solution uses Amazon Translate to automatically translate non-English logs in CloudWatch,"
